type.description: Run a basic selenium testcase using the selenium-python dialect.

property.name: testCase
property.label: Python Test Case
property.description: Specify your python-selenium testcase here. You can assume that a 'driver' object is made available for you before your testcase and the driver is closed afterwards.

property.name: seleniumProfile
property.label: Selenium Profile
property.description: The profile used to determine the context where and how to execute the test case. See shared configuration.

property.name: password
property.label: Password for the remote host
property.description: When using a remote host, override the password to the remote host here.

property.name: host
property.label: Host to run on. If not specified, will run on localhost.
